labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Server Settings drop-down menu stays opened behind the modal, which priorities it over the opened modal when pressing ESC to close the modal
data.expected_result: Server Settings drop-down menu closes behind after opening one of the listed modals
data.short_description: Server Settings drop-down menu doesn't close behind after opening one of the listed: Invite People, Create Channel, Create Category, Notification Settings, Change Nickname
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Server Settings drop-down menu from a server - Open one of the above listed
